basics.name: hall2
basics.description: halloween for college in a grand way

objectives: Create an engaging and memorable Halloween experience for college students
Foster community spirit and collaboration among attendees
Ensure a safe and enjoyable environment for all participants
Achieve high levels of attendee satisfaction and engagement
key_considerations: Define clear event goals and desired outcomes
Understand the interests and preferences of the college demographic
Select a venue that accommodates the expected number of attendees
Develop a comprehensive marketing strategy to promote the event
Plan for event logistics, including security, catering, and entertainment
planning_timeline: 3 months out: Begin planning and secure venue
2 months out: Finalize theme and entertainment options
1 month out: Launch marketing campaign and send out invitations
2 weeks out: Confirm all vendors and logistics
1 week out: Finalize headcount and prepare event materials
Day of: Set up venue, coordinate activities, and ensure smooth execution

budget_items.name: Main Stage Construction
budget_items.notes: Includes a large stage setup with seating arrangements and professional lighting for performances.

budget_items.name: Spooky Decor and Props
budget_items.notes: Thematic decorations, props, and lighting to create an immersive Halloween atmosphere.

budget_items.name: DJ and Live Band Booking
budget_items.notes: Hiring a DJ and live band to provide music and entertainment for the duration of the event.

budget_items.name: Food Stall Rentals
budget_items.notes: Rental of multiple food stalls offering a variety of snacks and beverages for attendees.

budget_items.name: Game Booths and Setup
budget_items.notes: Setting up interactive game booths and activities to engage attendees in fun Halloween-themed games.

budget_items.name: Event Promotion and Advertising
budget_items.notes: Creating posters, flyers, and social media campaigns to promote the event and attract attendees.

tasks.details: Reserve college ground for the event date.
Design promotional materials and decorations based on the 'cool' theme.
Select and book a catering service to accommodate 2000 attendees.
Book performers, DJs, or speakers for the event.
Plan for seating, sound systems, and lighting.
Use social media, posters, and college networks to advertise the event.
Create a system for attendees to register or purchase tickets.
Recruit and train volunteers to help manage the event.
Create a detailed timeline of activities for the event day.
Review the venue layout and logistics with the team.

basics.name: groupdance
basics.description: dancing room with all the people

objectives: Create an engaging and memorable Sangeet celebration
Ensure a positive and enjoyable experience for all 2000 attendees
Incorporate traditional and modern elements to reflect the couple's personality
Stay within budget constraints while maximizing the event's impact
key_considerations: Define the event's purpose and cultural significance
Understand the preferences and demographics of the target audience
Select a spacious and accessible venue that can accommodate 2000 guests
Plan effective marketing and promotion strategies to generate excitement
Ensure smooth execution on the day of the event with a detailed schedule
planning_timeline: 6-12 months out: Begin planning and set a budget
3-6 months out: Secure venue and key vendors (caterer, DJ, decorators)
2-3 months out: Finalize guest list and send out save-the-dates
1 month out: Send formal invitations and confirm all vendor arrangements
2 weeks out: Finalize event schedule and logistics
1 week out: Confirm final headcount and conduct last-minute checks
Day of: Execute the plan, enjoy the festivities, and celebrate!

budget_items.name: Hotel Ballroom Setup and Cleanup
budget_items.notes: Setup and cleanup services for the ballroom to accommodate 2000 attendees.

budget_items.name: Local Dance Troupe Performance
budget_items.notes: Engagement of local dance performers to showcase traditional dances.

budget_items.name: Traditional Snack and Beverage Stations
budget_items.notes: Setup of snack and beverage stations featuring traditional Indian snacks and drinks.

budget_items.name: Sound System and Lighting Rental
budget_items.notes: Rental of sound system and lighting equipment for the dance performances.

budget_items.name: Event Coordinator Services
budget_items.notes: Professional coordination services to manage the event flow and logistics.
